thread.title: Godfred Donsah plays full throttle as Bologna win at Carpi to end chain of defeats
thread.title_full: Godfred Donsah plays full throttle as Bologna win at Carpi to end chain of defeats

title: Godfred Donsah plays full throttle as Bologna win at Carpi to end chain of defeats
text:
18:10 CET Godfred Donsah plays full throttle as Bologna win at Carpi to end chain of defeats - www.ghanasoccernet.com Godfred Donsah 
Promising Ghana midfielder Godfred Donsah lasted the entire duration as Bologna revived their campaign with a 2-1 win at ten-man Carpi in the Emilia-Romagna derby. 
Donsah was making his first start for the Rossoblu since regaining full fitness from a thigh injury which sidelined him for weeks. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
